I don't think so, but will you please stop using "does" at the beginning of a question when it's not needed? Here, you would write "Is there a max level of reputation"

Give the guy a break. He's not an english speaker. KSP is a world game with people who speak a lot of different languages playing it. Who appointed you grammar corrector anyway?

And, to be honest, you can't get a full reputation bar ( atleast in 0.24 , so I assume the same applies to 0.25, since the devs said nothing on this issue ). The bar gets increasingly smaller increases per rep as you have more stored and you never get to a 100% filled bar. SO I see the OP statement as unlikely ...

OTOH it is sort of confirmed that, eventually, you will be able to lose the game in career due to rep below zero ...

Reputation gains decrease asymptotically as you approach 1000 rep, so doing something that early on would net +100 rep instead gives maybe +10. You can get ever closer to 1000 rep, but never actually reach or exceed it.
